app_detail:
ğŸ¬ğŸ¬ The best way to use KineMaster Editor Pro Tips & Trick

ğŸ¬ğŸ¬ KineMaster pro is one of the best video editor and maker app for android.


KineMaster pro is a professional video editor, that offers an easy way to edit and make videos, from your android phone.


This video maker allow you to create and edit videos easly on your android phone, you can also create and edit your projects in image and audio format.


KineMaster is a great tool for both professional and amateurs, to create, edit and make videos, mixing it with music, audio files and also images in different formats.


You can also, add the video recording to your videos projects.
Guide for KineMaster, is a guide that will help you to use easly and quickly this video editor, to create your video and publish it or share it on facebook, youtube, google+ and more.
This application will guide you to create great videos, with this editor, and use different formats of audio, video files, and also images.
We will help you to use this great video maker, and use the supported formats of files:
- For videos: mp4, 3gp, mov.
- For audio: mp3, m4a, aac, wav.
- For images and photos: jpeg, png, gif and other formats.

After following this guide, you will be able to create and edit your own videos, and publish them to your youtube channel, facebook page, or other social media.

**** DISCLAIMER: ****
